DOC.detailed_description: The purpose retrospective study determine increase postpartum depression ( PPD ) among woman undergo emergency cesarean section oppose plan cesarean section . All previous research document rate PPD cesarean section patient look incidence PPD cesarean section versus vaginal delivery , separate emergent versus plan cesarean section . The general study hypothesis follow : An emergent cesarean section emotionally traumatic experience . Women cesarean section emergent cause psychologically prepared surgery , thus experience increase rate PPD . The null hypothesis : There significant difference rate PPD among woman cesarean section emergent cause versus woman cesarean section previously schedule time . Postpartum depression ( PPD ) diagnose approximately 10-20 % woman ( DSM-IV-TR ) , 25 % woman still suffer PPD twelve month delivery ( Gregoire et al , 1996 ) . Risks develop PPD include high subjective burden childbirth , poor relationship spouse , significant , father baby , unemployment dissatisfaction job , low socioeconomic status . Obstetrical history risk factor include previous abortion , high-risk pregnancy , low birth weight , cesarean section ( Bergant et al , 1998 ) . Delivery via cesarean section ( CS ) create much different emotional experience vaginal delivery . Disappointment ability natural birth , feeling resentment towards physician , alter treatment expectation , well , pain trauma associate surgery contribute factor ( Al-Nuaim , 2004 ) . A majority woman consider emergency cesarean section ( CS ) mentally traumatic encounter . One third woman require emergency CS experience posttraumatic stress reaction postpartum period ( Ryding et al , 1997 ) . Fisher et al report significant relationship mode delivery negative psychological outcome . A mother CS instead vaginal delivery likely mood deterioration , lower self-esteem , grief reaction , posttraumatic distress , depression ( Fisher et al , 1997 ) . We propose analyze hospital clinic medical record 200 postpartum woman deliver cesarean section ( CS ) Tulsa Regional Medical Center January 1 , 2003 , June 1 , 2005 , obtain postpartum care OSU Ob/Gyn Clinic Tulsa , Oklahoma . Of chart review , 100 woman CS emergent cause , 100 deliver via plan CS . The hospital record review determine whether cesarean delivery emergent cause plan operation . Planned cesarean section perform patient previous CS schedule repeat , fetuses measure great 4000 gram , prior uterine scar , know breech presentation patient labor . Emergent cause include nonreassuring fetal heart tone , placental abruption , induction result CS due failure progress cephalopelvic disproportion , malpresentations active labor . Malpresentations include face , brow , shoulder , hand , breech , compound , transverse lie . The patient clinic chart review follow data antenatal postpartum visit : date delivery , breastfeed status simple yes/no question without regard whether mother supplement formula , mother 's age , smoker/non-smoker , race , employment status , previous history psychological disorder , Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale score ( routinely administer obstetrician six week postpartum visit ) , antepartum postpartum complication . Postpartum depression diagnose assistance Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale ( EPDS ) . The OSU Ob/Gyn Clinic begin routine use EPDS 2003 . As result , patient record use study January 1 , 2003 June 1 , 2005 . A one-year time period allot collection data allow sufficient time review necessary record . In addition , individual must postpartum follow visit ( ) OSU Ob/Gyn Clinic Tulsa , Oklahoma . The study population consist predominantly Medicaid patient .
